channel.title: [508] Attack option [508]
channel.description:
HI guys, me again D:
This is obv a pretty simple fix but I can't work it out, the player option go in this order:
Trade with ..... Follow..... Walk here.....
Seeing as trade and follow doesn't work in 508's there useless and in the wrong order, whe you go into bounty hunter or the wilderness the options are still the same. I would like them as:
Attack... Follow... Trade... Walk here...
Please help, and thank you for your time.
